<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sprite Apple](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1932)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 51 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>1 minute (Interact)</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A sparkling candy coating covers a sprite apple. For 10 minutes after consuming a sprite apple, you shed [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) in a 20-foot emanation (and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) for the next 20 feet). While shedding this light, you can't be [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) if you're visible, and if you're [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26), you're concealed instead rather than being [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39). The light matches the vibrant color of the apple's candy coating. Creatures in the bright light are subject to another effect, depending on the type of apple.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sprite Apple (Chartreuse)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 51 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 26 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Creatures in the bright light feel more in tune with nature, gaining a +1 item bonus to [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) checks and to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks attempted against [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) or [plants](/Traits.aspx?ID=125) (if they have the [wild empathy](/Classes.aspx?ID=6) class feature or some other ability to make such checks).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sprite Apple (Golden)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 51 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Creatures in the bright light feel kind and inviting, taking a –1 item penalty to their Will DC against [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sprite Apple (Pink)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 51 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 16 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Creatures in the bright light feel a burst of creativity, gaining a +1 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Sprite Apple (Teal)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 51 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 41 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Creatures in the bright light feel a sense of calm, gaining a +1 item bonus to saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects.
